Container.Name: FreePBX-12
Container.Description: [b]This FreePBX 12 with Asterisk 13.1 - Let Freedom Ring.[/b][br] FreePBX is a web-based open source GUI (graphical user interface).[br][br] that controls and manages Asterisk (PBX), an open source communication server.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : This is where you can keep FreePBX backups.
